data.title: Trains Hamilton Central to Durham from €49.09
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Hamilton Central to Durham in 3h 14m. Compare prices, view live journey times & book cheap train tickets for Hamilton Central to Durham.
data.text:
If you want to know more about the journey from Hamilton Central to Durham by train, look no further!

The average journey time from Hamilton Central to Durham by train is 5 hours 41 minutes, although on the fastest services it can take just 3 hours 14 minutes. You'll usually find 9 trains per day travelling the 119 miles (191 km) between these two destinations. You'll need to make 1 change along the way to Durham. You'll be travelling with London North Eastern Railway, Avanti West Coast or Lumo on your way to Durham, as these are the main rail operators on this route.

Plan your trip ahead of time and book early if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Tickets from Hamilton Central to Durham start from €49.09 when you book in advance, so use our Journey Planner to view the latest prices. Travelling Off-Peak or using a Railcard are also great ways to save.

Keep reading for more information about the train journey to Durham, including FAQs, and tips on booking cheap train tickets. Check the timetable above for live train times or if you're ready to book, just start a search for tickets with us today.
